tokens.text: can be thrown as a projectile

generated_doNotEdit.title: Projectile
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the entity to be a thrown entity.

fields.title: Angle Offset
fields.description: Determines the angle at which the projectile is thrown

fields.title: Catch Fire
fields.description: If true, the entity hit will be set on fire

fields.title: Crit Particle On Hurt
fields.description: If true, the projectile will produce additional particles when a critical hit happens

fields.title: Destroy On Hurt
fields.description: If true, this entity will be destroyed when hit

fields.title: Filter
fields.description: Entity Definitions defined here can't be hurt by the projectile

fields.title: Fire Affected By Griefing
fields.description: If true, whether the projectile causes fire is affected by the mob griefing game rule

fields.title: Gravity
fields.description: The gravity applied to this entity when thrown. The higher the value, the faster the entity falls

fields.title: Hit Nearest Passenger
fields.description: If true, when hitting a vehicle, and there's at least one passenger in the vehicle, the damage will be dealt to the passenger closest to the projectile impact point. If there are no passengers, this setting does nothing.

fields.title: Hit Sound
fields.description: The sound that plays when the projectile hits something

fields.title: Homing
fields.description: If true, the projectile homes in to the nearest entity

fields.title: Ignored Entities
fields.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] An array of strings defining the types of entities that this entity does not collide with.

fields.title: Inertia
fields.description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in air

fields.title: Is Dangerous
fields.description: If true, the projectile will be treated as dangerous to the players

fields.title: Knockback
fields.description: If true, the projectile will knock back the entity it hits

fields.title: Lightning
fields.description: If true, the entity hit will be struck by lightning

fields.title: Liquid Inertia
fields.description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in water

fields.title: Multiple Targets
fields.description: If true, the projectile can hit multiple entities per flight

fields.title: Offset
fields.description: The offset from the entity's anchor where the projectile will spawn

fields.title: Fire Time
fields.description: Time in seconds that the entity hit will be on fire for

fields.title: Particle
fields.description: Particle to use upon collision

fields.title: Potion Effect
fields.description: Defines the effect the arrow will apply to the entity it hits

fields.title: Power
fields.description: Determines the velocity of the projectile

fields.title: Reflect Immunity
fields.description: During the specified time, in seconds, the projectile cannot be reflected by hitting it

fields.title: Reflect On Hurt
fields.description: If true, this entity will be reflected back when hit

fields.title: Semi Random Diff Damage
fields.description: If true, damage will be randomized based on damage and speed

fields.title: Shoot Sound
fields.description: The sound that plays when the projectile is shot

fields.title: Shoot Target
fields.description: If true, the projectile will be shot towards the target of the entity firing it

fields.title: Should Bounce
fields.description: If true, the projectile will bounce upon hit

fields.title: Splash Potion
fields.description: If true, the projectile will be treated like a splash potion

fields.title: Splash Range
fields.description: Radius in blocks of the 'splash' effect

fields.title: Uncertainty Base
fields.description: The base accuracy. Accuracy is determined by the formula uncertaintyBase - difficultyLevel * uncertaintyMultiplier

fields.title: Uncertainty Multiplier
fields.description: Determines how much difficulty affects accuracy. Accuracy is determined by the formula uncertaintyBase - difficultyLevel * uncertaintyMultiplier
